      • identifyRegexVGs

        public java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> identifyRegexVGs(java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> matv)
        This function is used to apply verb group identification rules before disabiguation
        Parameters:
        matv - This is the input sentence in terms of sequence of morphologically analyzed tokens
        Returns:
        A Vector of MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken is returned with some verbs having their tags fixed.

      • closeVGFile

        public static void closeVGFile()

      • commonVG

        public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Integer> commonVG(java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> matv,
                                           java.util.Vector<TaggedToken> ttv,
                                           boolean before)
        This function is used as a common rule application engine by both the VG functions(before and after disambiguation).
        Parameters:
        matv - This is the input sentence in terms of sequence of morphologically analyzed tokens
        ttv - This is the input sentence in terms of sequence of tagged tokens
        before - This is the boolean flag indicating whether it is called before or after disambiguation
        Returns:
        A Vector of Integer is returned with verb groups numbered. VM getting 1 and all VAUXs getting 2,3 and so on in the single verb group

      • identifyRegexVGsAfterDisam

        public java.util.Vector<TaggedToken> identifyRegexVGsAfterDisam(java.util.Vector<TaggedToken> ttv,
                                                       java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> matv)
        This function is used to apply verb group identification rules after disabiguation
        Parameters:
        ttv - This is the input sentence in terms of sequence of tagged tokens
        matv - This is the input sentence in terms of sequence of morphologically analyzed tokens
        Returns:
        A Vector of TaggedToken is returned with some verb tags changed depending upon whether some rule matched

        public java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> identifyVerbGroupsNew(java.util.Vector<MorphologicallyAnalyzedToken> matv)
